item.description: Come learn, experience and practice BEING a Co-Creator!!! The Law of Attraction is a powerful, transformative and life changing Universal Law that can lead you down the path to realizing your dreams...Our thoughts become our reality... Every other week we will be in Fall River,MA gathering with other Positive, kind, leading edge thinkers! We talk about Law of Attraction with regards to relationships, career, money, health and lots of other topics... Teachings include the Abraham Hicks materials as they relate to LOA... Come check us out and get in the Vortex where the world you wish to live in and create... IS!!! Nicole used the law of attraction when she re-invented herself after working in the medical sales field for corporate america... As she applied and worked the principles, she learned she wanted to be living a life more aligned to her dreams and what felt good in her heart...She currently leads two LOA groups running over 150 meetings... She has a private cliental all over the country which she guides in one on one coaching sessions.
item.how_to_find_us: white church off of North Main Street pass the YMCA
item.why: Learning how to work with, applying and understanding the Law of Attraction will propel forward movement in any area of life...towards everything your heart desires...

group.name: South Shore Law of Attraction Manifestors

item.name: Manifesting & Attracting an Amazing 2012!
